official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the suitability and feasibility of designating the Fox and Lower Wisconsin River corridors in the State of Wisconsin as a National Heritage Corridor, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fox-Wisconsin River National Heritage Corridor Study Act of 1993

summary.text: Fox-Wisconsin River National Heritage Corridor Study Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study and report to specified congressional committees on the suitability and feasibility of designating the Fox and Lower Wisconsin River corridors in Wisconsin as a National Heritage Corridor. Establishes the Fox-Wisconsin River Study Advisory Commission. Directs the Commission to submit annual activity reports to the Secretary and the Governor of Wisconsin. Terminates the Commission upon study completion. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Fox-Wisconsin River National Heritage Corridor Study Act of 1993

A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the suitability and feasibility of designating the Fox and Lower Wisconsin River corridors in the State of Wisconsin as a National Heritage Corridor, and for other purposes.
